name: Nix Quest Alpha 1.0.0
description:
Alpha 1.0.0

13.6 2020

Nix quest is an RPG game currently in development.

I made this game with RPG maker 2003 about a year ago on my old pc, then I bought a new pc and I forgot about thisgame, today, I decided to export all game files from my old pc to new one. Nix quest is incomplete, I want to add more gameplay to the game and I want to change almost all textures, because I was using RPG maker default textures. Yet you can consider trying my game for free if you want. I would be happy if you'll do so :)))

-Tomas Becvar

If you will need something, contact me  here: tomasbecvar@5@gmail.com

Or discord: Arcast#7704
